1.0.0.en: Add your Frigate NVR cameras to Homey

1.0.1.en: Improved image management and added capabilities

1.0.4.en: Improve throttling, prevent unique event double fire and improve stale event handling

1.0.6.en: Improve error handling, fix device feed/capability order issue

1.1.0.en: Added logging to a local file (limited to 1MB) for improved debugging. Added detection of dogs, cats, (motor)cycles and cars.

1.1.1.en: Improved MQTT interface by catching errors and other events

1.1.3.en: Ability to copy logs and share them manually

1.1.4.en: Process events even if a video clip is missing

1.1.5.en: Improved logging and fix handling of stationary objects

1.1.6.en: Camera event debounce increased to 2 minutes. Improved logging of event filtering.

1.1.7.en: Trigger events even if snapshots are not present. Placeholder images will be used instead.

1.2.0.en: Events have zones. Ability to ignore events with no snapshot. Ability to have unique flow events trigger more than once.

1.2.1.en: Fix broken app settings page (required snapshots option)
